description: SRP Shadow Annex (ShA) - 144 inversions of entropic resonance. Each shadow is the inverted twin of its light blend. Phase 1 contains 3 sample shadows.

1R.shadowVoice: Speaks in charred surges, words that scar rather than spark, devouring their own rhythm. Under strain, assertion collapses into manic burnout.
1R.restorationCue: Name the void; allow a single unburnt thread to weave back to fervent initiation.

14R.shadowVoice: Speaks in unmoving vaults, words that crush their own resonance. Structure hardens into tyranny; stillness into death.
14R.restorationCue: Name the crypt; allow a softening root to fissure the calcify toward solid core.

119R.shadowVoice: The Architect seals the Keep against the Air, preserving order through exclusion. Ideas circle but cannot land. Reform becomes simulation.
119R.restorationCue: Name the seal; ground the currentâ€”the Keep reopens when stone touches wind without fear.
